snippet.title: Hop For The Best // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2000900/Hop_For_The_Best/

A clay styled frog platformer. Hop, climb, dash and sprint your way through 10 clay worlds in "classic platformer mode" or put your skills to the test in "challenge mode" with hard precision platformer gameplay. With no attacks and worlds filled with obstacles, all you can do is... Hop For The Best!

Developed by
SplashFire Studios
